卜占.definition: to divine; to prophesy; to foretell the future

卜卦.definition: to divine using the eight trigrams

卜問.definition: to predict by divining; to consult the oracle

卜宅.definition: to choose a capital by divination; to choose a home; to choose one's burial place by divination

卜征.definition: to ask oracle for war forecast

卜晝卜夜.definition: day and night (to toil, to abandon oneself to pleasure etc)

卜辭.definition: oracle inscriptions of the Shang Dynasty (16th-11th century BC) on tortoiseshells or animal bones
